Why to Choose Node.js for Product Development?

By Antino Labs August 25, 2021 3 Mins Read

Node.js is a runtime environment which is reliant on the V8 JavaScript engine of Chrome that helps implement the JavaScript code on server-side. Node.js is not a framework or library. Because of its exceptional support of JavaScript and unique features, developers or business owners love Node.js a lot.

Node.js helps in giving two-way constant communication between client-side and server-side. And hence, Node.js breaks down the work pressure between the service provider and the client. Furthermore, Node.js works on a single-threaded event-based loop for building all non-blocking mobile applications.

Reasons to Choose Node.js for Product Development

  • SEO-Friendly
  • Speed
  • Unmatched Technical Support
  • Widespread Community
  • Easy to Use

SEO-Friendly

Usually, developers uses backward approach while adopting SEO practices. First, developers design a website and then they redesign it to make it compatible with SEO. But this isn’t the case with Node.js. Node.js’ built-in features extend such pre-available codes that are in line with search algorithms.

Speed

Developed by Google, the V8 engine powers Node.js. The V8 engine lets the JavaScript code be transformed to machine code and adds to development time savings on program accomplishments. Products that are developed with Node.js for web app development can handle a significantly larger number of parallel connections.

Unmatched Technical Support

The parent team of Node.js offers long-term support and that’s the reason why professionals prefer Node.js for web development. Traditionally, after the release of every version of Node.js, the code is preserved for the next 18 months. Also, rather than continuing to add new features, this period is used to fix bugs and accumulate user feedback for future releases.

Widespread Community

Node.js has a widespread and well framed community of developers. Regular upgrades keep people returning back for more, and access code-bytes and ready-to-use plugins available on GitHub.

Easy to Use

Almost every programmer is familiar with JavaScript these days. Node.js is comparatively easier for inexperienced coders to make the switch as Node.js app development is a JS-based runtime system. Programmers can come up with similar results that can be garnered while working on PHP, Spring Boot or Django comparatively in much less time and devoting much less computational resources.

Wrapping Up

I think you must have got your answer, why companies are using Node.js at such a pace. Node.js is really a piece of cake to handle for developers. As a web development company, Antino Labs can help in moving your product to Node.js in case you haven’t moved yet.
